TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathExpression extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个类型化的类，表示已编译的 XPath 表达式。

span.span: Provides a typed class that represents a compiled XPath expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类返回的结果作为方法类。This class is returned as the result of the method of the class. 它是到参数， ， ，和方法类。It is a parameter to the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XPath 返回类型来确定如何处理 XPath 表达式。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members:

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，对 XPath 表达式选择的节点排序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddSort (object expr, System.Collections.IComparer comparer);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSort(object expr, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub AddSort (expr As Object, comparer As IComparer)
public: abstract void AddSort(System::Object ^ expr, System::Collections::IComparer ^ comparer);

param.name: expr
param.span: 一个表示排序关键字的对象。

span.span: An object representing the sort key.

param.span: 这可以是节点的 值，还可以是具有已编译 XPath 表达式的 对象。

span.span: This can be the value of the node or an object with a compiled XPath expression.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 对象，为比较两个对象的等效性提供特定的数据类型比较。

span.span: An object that provides the specific data type comparisons for comparing two objects for equivalence.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，按指定的 对象对 XPath 表达式选择的节点排序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression according to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用户能够通过而不是其数据类型的对象进行排序的字符串或数字。The method enables users to sort objects by their data type instead of by string or number. 对象提供的实现支持用户定义的类的排序的方法。The object provides an implementation of the method that supports sorting on user-defined classes. 在下面的示例中，丛书按 ISBN 编号，其中`isbn`是一个对象，实现接口。In the following example, the books are sorted by ISBN number, where `isbn` is an object that implements the interface. ```vb Dim expression As XPathExpression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book") Dim isbn As ISBN = New ISBN() expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn) ``` ```csharp XPathExpression expression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book"); ISBN isbn = new ISBN(); expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn); ``` 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 添加排序的顺序提供排序关键字的使用顺序。The order in which the sorts are added provides the sort key order. - 如果或排序键需要命名空间解析，则必须使用方法以提供用于命名空间解析。If the or the sort key requires namespace resolution, you must use the method to provide an for namespace resolution. - 如果不包括前缀，则假定命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 是空的命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用方法并提供，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.

exception.span: 或排序关键字包括前缀，并且未提供 或未在所提供的 中找到该前缀。

span.span: The or sort key includes a prefix and either an is not provided, or the prefix cannot be found in the supplied .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void AddSort (object expr, System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder order, System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder caseOrder, string lang, System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType dataType);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSort(object expr, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder order, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder caseOrder, string lang, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType dataType) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub AddSort (expr As Object, order As XmlSortOrder, caseOrder As XmlCaseOrder, lang As String, dataType As XmlDataType)

public: abstract void AddSort(System::Object ^ expr, System::Xml::XPath::XmlSortOrder order, System::Xml::XPath::XmlCaseOrder caseOrder, System::String ^ lang, System::Xml::XPath::XmlDataType dataType);

param.name: expr
param.span: 一个表示排序关键字的对象。

span.span: An object representing the sort key.

param.span: 这可以是节点的 值，还可以是具有已编译 XPath 表达式的 对象。

span.span: This can be the value of the node or an object with a compiled XPath expression.

param.name: order
param.span: 一个 值，它指示排序顺序。

span.span: An value indicating the sort order.

param.name: caseOrder
param.span: 一个 值，它指示大写字母和小写字母的排序方式。

span.span: An value indicating how to sort uppercase and lowercase letters.

param.name: lang

span.span: The language to use for comparison.

param.span: 使用 类，该类可传递到语言类型的 方法，美式英语的“us-en”。

span.span: Uses the class that can be passed to the method for the language types, for example, "us-en" for U.S. English.

param.span: 如果指定了空的字符串，则使用系统环境来确定 。

span.span: If an empty string is specified, the system environment is used to determine the .

param.name: dataType
param.span: 一个 值，它指示数据类型的排序顺序。

span.span: An value indicating the sort order for the data type.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，根据所提供的参数对 XPath 表达式所选的节点进行排序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression according to the supplied parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks - 添加排序的顺序提供排序关键字的使用顺序。The order in which the sorts are added provides the sort key order. - 如果或排序键需要命名空间解析，则必须使用方法以提供用于命名空间解析。If the or the sort key requires namespace resolution, you must use the method to provide an for namespace resolution. - 如果不包括前缀，则假定命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 是空的命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用方法并提供，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何按丛书文档的价格的降序顺序排序。The following example shows how to sort the books document by price in descending order. [!code-vb[XPathXMLExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/vb/xpathexpression.addsort.vb#4)] [!code-csharp[XPathXMLExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/cs/xpathexpression.addsort.cs#5)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

exception.span: 或排序关键字包括前缀，并且未提供 或未在所提供的 中找到该前缀。

span.span: The or sort key includes a prefix and either an is not provided, or the prefix cannot be found in the supplied .

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression Clone() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Clone () As XPathExpression
public: abstract System::Xml::XPath::XPathExpression ^ Clone();

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取此 的复本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this .
A new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类中重写时方法返回的此克隆具有与此相同的状态对象对象。When overridden in a derived class, the method returns a clone of this object with the same state as this object.

summary.span: 编译指定的 XPath 表达式，并且返回表示 XPath 表达式的 对象。

span.span: Compiles the XPath expression specified and returns an object that represents the XPath expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression Compile (string xpath);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression Compile(string xpath) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compile (xpath As String) As XPathExpression
public: static System::Xml::XPath::XPathExpression ^ Compile(System::String ^ xpath);

span.span: An XPath expression.

summary.span: 编译指定的 XPath 表达式并返回表示 XPath 表达式的 对象。

span.span: Compiles the XPath expression specified and returns an object representing the XPath expression.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 表达式进行计算以产生以下结果类型之一。An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following result types. - - - - > [!NOTE] > 如果在 XPath 表达式中指定与无效数量的自变量 （或未实现的用户定义函数），则仅在运行时将发生异常。If a user-defined function with an invalid number of arguments (or an unimplemented user-defined function) is specified in the XPath expression, an exception occurs only at run time. 在编译时不检查用户定义的函数和用户定义函数因异常时执行计算的表达式时，才发生。User-defined functions are not checked at compile time and exceptions that result from user-defined functions occur only if execution evaluates the expression. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XPath 返回类型来确定如何处理 XPath 表达式。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression. 该示例使用方法来返回新对象。The example uses the method to return the new objects. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

exception.span: XPath 表达式参数不是有效的 XPath 表达式。

span.span: The XPath expression parameter is not a valid XPath expression.
The XPath expression is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression Compile (string xpath, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression Compile(string xpath, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
Public Shared Function Compile (xpath As String, nsResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As XPathExpression
public: static System::Xml::XPath::XPathExpression ^ Compile(System::String ^ xpath, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);

span.span: An XPath expression.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 实现用于命名空间解析的 接口的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface for namespace resolution.

summary.span: 使用用于命名空间解析的 对象编译指定的 XPath 表达式，并且返回表示 XPath 表达式的 对象。

span.span: Compiles the specified XPath expression, with the object specified for namespace resolution, and returns an object that represents the XPath expression.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 表达式进行计算以产生以下结果类型之一。An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following result types. - - - - > [!NOTE] > 如果在 XPath 表达式中指定的参数数目无效 （或未实现的用户定义函数），则仅在运行时将发生异常。If a user-defined function with an invalid number of arguments (or an unimplemented user-defined function) is specified in the XPath expression, an exception occurs only at run-time. 在编译时不检查用户定义的函数和用户定义函数导致的异常时执行计算的表达式时，才发生。User-defined functions are not checked at compile time and exceptions resulting from user-defined functions occur only if execution evaluates the expression. > [!NOTE] > 不能编译通过传递的一个步骤中的自定义上下文，该类实现，作为此方法的自变量。It is not possible to compile a with a custom context in one step by passing an , which implements , as an argument to this method. 若要使用与自定义上下文，必须调用方法之后编译表达式。To use a with a custom context, you must call the method after compiling the expression.

exception.span: XPath 表达式参数不是有效的 XPath 表达式。

span.span: The XPath expression parameter is not a valid XPath expression.
The XPath expression is not valid.

public: abstract property System::String ^ Expression { System::String ^ get(); };

A representation of the .

span.span: An value representing the result type of the XPath expression.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XPath 返回类型来确定如何处理 XPath 表达式。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，指定要用于命名空间解析的 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the object to use for namespace resolution.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void SetContext (System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetContext(class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub SetContext (nsResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver)
public: abstract void SetContext(System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 实现 接口以用于命名空间解析的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface to use for namespace resolution.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，指定要用于命名空间解析的 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the object to use for namespace resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用实现的类支持 Namespace 解析接口，如类。Namespace resolution is supported using classes that implement the interface, such as the class. 存储前缀和命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 的映射。The stores prefix and namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) mappings. 如果需要命名空间解析，前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到对象，如类，该类实现接口，与必须调用方法以指定接口用于命名空间解析的对象。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an object, such as the class, which implements the interface, and the method must be called to specify the interface object to use for namespace resolution. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果不包括前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用方法并提供包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间的对象。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an object that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. - 你也可以提供到命名空间解析的接口对象方法创建时你对象。You can also supply an interface object for namespace resolution to the method when you create your object. - 接受为命名空间解析程序，因此可以实现自定义上下文，并使用函数和变量基于和。 accepts as a namespace resolver, so you can implement a custom context and use functions and variables based on and . XPath 表达式将执行它们。The XPath expression will execute them. 有关详细信息，请参阅[用户定义函数和变量](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md)。For more information, see [User Defined Functions and Variables](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XPath 返回类型来确定如何处理 XPath 表达式中，以及如何使用方法以提供命名空间解析的对象。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression, and how to use the method to provide an object for namespace resolution. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

span.span: The object parameter is not derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void SetContext (System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager nsManager);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetContext(class System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager nsManager) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub SetContext (nsManager As XmlNamespaceManager)
public: abstract void SetContext(System::Xml::XmlNamespaceManager ^ nsManager);

param.name: nsManager
param.span: 要用于命名空间解析的 对象。

span.span: An object to use for namespace resolution.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，指定要用于命名空间解析的 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the object to use for namespace resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用支持 Namespace 解析存储前缀和命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 映射的类。Namespace resolution is supported using the class which stores prefix and namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) mappings. 如果需要命名空间解析，前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到对象和必须调用方法以指定要用于命名空间解析的对象。If the requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to the object and the method must be called to specify the object to use for namespace resolution. 以下是使用时要考虑的重要说明方法。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 如果不包括前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。If the does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace. 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用方法并提供对象，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the method and provide an object that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace. - 你也可以提供到命名空间解析的对象方法创建时你对象。You can also supply an object for namespace resolution to the method when you create your object. - 接受为命名空间解析程序，因此可以实现自定义上下文，并使用函数和变量基于和。 accepts as a namespace resolver, so you can implement a custom context and use functions and variables based on and . XPath 表达式将执行它们。The XPath expression will execute them. 有关详细信息，请参阅[用户定义函数和变量](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md)。For more information, see [User Defined Functions and Variables](~/docs/standard/data/xml/user-defined-functions-and-variables.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 XPath 返回类型来确定如何处理 XPath 表达式中，以及如何使用方法以提供命名空间解析的对象。The following example shows how to use the XPath return type to determine how to process the XPath expression, and how to use the method to provide an object for namespace resolution. [!code-cpp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CPP/returntype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/CS/returntype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XPathExpression.ReturnType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathExpression.ReturnType/VB/returntype.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

exception.span: 对象参数不是从 类派生的。

span.span: The object parameter is not derived from the class.
